mapper.select: SELECT A.NAME AS NAME ,A.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS ,A.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY ,A.EMAIL AS EMAIL ,A.PHONENUM AS PHONENUM ,A.PIC_NAME AS PICNAME ,R.STATUSNAME AS STATUS ,S.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD ,S.SREGINUM AS SREGNUM ,S.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD ,S.APPLICANTSEQ AS APPLICANTSEQ ,S.SEMESTER AS SEMESTER ,S.ENTERDATE AS ENTERDATE FROM STUDENT S, APPLICANT A, USERREASON R WHERE S.SREGINUM = #{userId} AND S.PASSWORD = #{userPw} AND S.APPLICANTSEQ = A.APPLICANTSEQ AND S.STATUSNUM = R.STATUSNUM

SELECT A.NAME AS NAME ,A.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS ,A.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY ,A.EMAIL AS EMAIL ,A.PHONENUM AS PHONENUM ,A.PIC_NAME AS PICNAME ,R.STATUSNAME AS STATUS ,S.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD ,S.SREGINUM AS SREGNUM ,S.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD ,S.APPLICANTSEQ AS APPLICANTSEQ ,S.SEMESTER AS SEMESTER ,S.ENTERDATE AS ENTERDATE FROM STUDENT S, APPLICANT A, USERREASON R WHERE S.SREGINUM = #{userId} AND S.APPLICANTSEQ = A.APPLICANTSEQ AND S.STATUSNUM = R.STATUSNUM

SELECT P.PREGINUM AS pRegNum ,P.NAME AS name ,P.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY ,P.PHONENUM AS PHONENUM ,P.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS ,P.ENTERDATE AS ENTERDATE ,P.EMAIL AS EMAIL ,R.STATUSNAME AS STATUS ,P.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD ,P.PPICTURE AS PICNAME FROM PROFESSOR P, USERREASON R WHERE P.PREGINUM = #{userId} AND P.PASSWORD = #{userPw} AND P.STATUSNUM = R.STATUSNUM
SELECT S.SREGINUM FROM STUDENT S, APPLICANT A WHERE S.APPLICANTSEQ = A.APPLICANTSEQ AND A.NAME = #{name}
SELECT S.SREGINUM FROM APPLICANT A ,STUDENT S WHERE A.APPLICANTSEQ = S.APPLICANTSEQ AND A.EMAIL = #{arg0} AND A.NAME = #{arg1}
SELECT S.SREGINUM FROM APPLICANT A ,STUDENT S WHERE A.APPLICANTSEQ = S.APPLICANTSEQ AND S.SREGINUM = #{arg0} AND A.NAME = #{arg1}
SELECT T.NOTICESEQ ,T.TITLE ,TO_CHAR(T.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INDATE ,T.CONTENTS ,A.NAME FROM TOTNOTICE T ,ADMIN A WHERE A.ADMINID = T.WRITER AND T.NOTICESEQ = #{post}

SELECT DATESEQ ,STARTDATE ,ENDDATE ,ATIME ,NAME FROM (select DATESEQ ,TO_CHAR(STARTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STARTDATE ,TO_CHAR(ENDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENDDATE ,ABS(SYSDATE-STARTDATE) AS ATIME ,NAME ,ROWNUM FROM SCHOOLEVENTS ORDER BY ATIME ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
ORDER BY STARTDATE ASC
